title: Ticket #341: Compile all the tests files in condor_tests for Windows
description:
Compile all the tests files in condor_tests for use on a Windows test machine (i.e. NMI).

I would prefer that this be another Visual Studio Solution, but creating all those project may be more time consuming than simply writing a Makefile, or trying to get imake to compile on Windows.

Milestones:

  • Create a new Solution that contains all the projects relevant to Windows.
    • Ouput should go to TestRelease and TestDebug.
    • The top-level directory in the solution named after the set of tests it contains, for example condor_tests would contain x_coredump, etc.
  • Integrate the new Solution into the current build process.
    • condor_tests depends on the Condor proper build for its libraries.
  • Push all the project executables into a user defined directory, so that, for instance, they can be called by NMI test suite.
  • Create an environmental variable pointing to the location of all the libs that the Condor compile creates.
remarks:
2009-Jun-24 11:46:47 by ziliang:
All the stuff that will compile and link without a rewrite do so. Also talked with Pete and it looks like we should not drag in all the other libraries. The libcondorapi should have everything we need. Will modify the dependencies and see if we can get rid of all the linking warnings.

2009-Jul-10 15:51:28 by ziliang:
It seems that on Windows, condor_api.lib needs to include a few Windows specific things that it currently does not. Will need to do that to get the thing to properly link. I hope.

2009-Jul-10 20:26:51 by burnett:
Do you know what kind of things it is missing? Could you post a list of the link errors, or do you have a list of the missing parts already compiled?

2009-Jul-13 21:20:56 by ziliang:
After further consultations with Pete, it became apparent that condor_api.lib never actually worked on Windows as it was missing multiple Windows dependencies. All of those have been dealt with except for some stuff it pulls in from daemon.cpp, the daemon client code. It looks to be authentication stuff and I'll need to consult either Todd or Ben on whether they are needed or whether I can stub them.

2010-Aug-17 14:22:29 by ziliang:
Waiting on cmake branch.
2011-Jan-27 14:21:33 by danb:
Bulk change of target version from v070505 to v070506 using ./ticket-target-mover.
2011-Feb-01 14:49:30 by tannenba:
Bulk change of target version from v070506 to NULL using ./ticket-target-mover.

2011-Mar-30 15:13:05 by tstclair:
again this is pretty much done now.
